alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:28PM CDT until July 21 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buffalo, or 23 miles east of Valley City, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Absaraka around 835 PM CDT. Wheatland around 840 PM CDT. Amenia around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Casselton and Durbin. This includes Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 317 and 342. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
